text: Zoë Tiberius Quinn (born 1987) is an American video game developer, programmer, writer, and artist. In 2014, a blog post by her ex-boyfriend sparked the Gamergate controversy, in which Quinn was subjected to a lot of criticism and harassment. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:American feminists Category:American artists
title: Zoë Quinn
